nodes.text: Perfume was a type of fragrance applied to a person's body or dwelling. When the Jedi Master Quinlan Vos and former Jedi turned assassin and bounty hunter Asajj Ventress infiltrated a fancy party on Raxus Secundus with the intent of killing Count Dooku, Ventress wore perfume fitting for the party, which made Vos's nose twitch. Luke Skywalker found that his room in the secret complex of Toopil on Rodia to be his favorite area, since it had been properly cleaned instead of sprayed with a lot of perfume.
